meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Brett Dvorak Mysti Kofford Thomas Zamora Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #3957.

div.div:
2001 College Championship quarterfinal game 5.
From the campus at UCLA.
(Jimmy: [Austrian accent] I'm Jimmy of the Clue Crew. Flex your mental muscle. We're here to pump... [claps] you up... next on Jeopardy!)

td.p: Brett Dvorak, a junior at Indiana University from Granger, Indiana
Mysti Kofford, a junior at Boston University from New Orleans, Louisiana
Thomas Zamora, a junior at the University of Southern California from Cypress, California

tr.td: YOU SEE "LA"
STATE CAPITALS OF THE WORLD
RELIGION
GUINNESS RECORDS
PATRIOTIC SONGS
20th CENTURY NOVELS

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Thomas
Mysti
Brett

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Congratulations, Thomas. You are definitely a semifinalist. You\'ll be back. Now let\'s find out who the other semifinalists are.)
(Vinita: Vinita Kailasanath, Stanford University.)
(Marques: Marques Redd, Harvard University.)
(Sara: Sara Dean, Syracuse University.)
(Matt: Matt Schnippert, Florida State University.)
(Alex: And there are four wildcard spots for the high scorers among nonwinners. One of them is standing in front of me right now. Mysti Kofford with $7,600. Come on over, Mysti. Brett Dvorak is another one. He made it.)
[Cheers and applause]
(Alex: And there are two others. Let\'s see who they are.)
(Brittany: Brittany Rogers, Saddleback College.)
(Jayce: Jayce Newton, UCLA.)
(Alex: How about that? We saved him for the last.)
BrettWho are Barbara Bush + Abigail Adams?
$3,300
MystiWho are Abagail Abigail Adams + Barbara Bush?
$200
ThomasWho are Abigail Adams & Barbara Bush
$6,601
Abigail Adams & Barbara Bush')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'First & last names of the 2 First Ladies who each had a husband & son serve as president')

tr.td: FIRST LADIES
First & last names of the 2 First Ladies who each had a husband & son serve as president
Thomas
Mysti
Brett
Automatic semifinalist
2nd place: $2,500 if eliminated
3rd place: $2,500 if eliminated
Thomas
Mysti
Brett

17 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W

20 R
(including 1 DD),

(including 1 DD),
4 W

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans.
